Fortuneteller looked at him blankly, "De-ceptic-on
Ma-matrix of Lea-dership...that could explain the
bolts."

>  
> "That fool's opinion is meaningless.  I possess the
> one thing that trully denotes leadership.  The
> Decepticon Matrix of Leadership." the clone said.

>

> "I would like to

>
